phrases: watashi ga umareta asa no machi yuki no naka ni umoreta
sore wa sore wa chiisai te de aozora wo aoida
sanagara mukashi kara yoku shiru tonari no ano ko no you ni
katahou no mimitabu de kiku sotsugyou no canon
hitori demo daijoubu yo tte mekureteru watashi no story
dareka no sei ni shitai yo
kanashikutte naite bakkari itara me ga tokete nakunatta
aki ni nari mata fuyu ni nari hitotsu toshi wo totta
tooku made nigete iru tsumori demo owaranai kimi no story
sugari nagara oikakete mitemo ashige ni saretemo
My hometown lay buried in snow the morning I was born.
I looked up at the blue sky with my tiny hands.
The face of the girl next door that I have known so well...
It is as familiar as the graduation canon.
Thriving in solitude has been mistaken as my life story.
I want to blame it on someone.
Tears and sorrow caused me to miss my chance.
Autumn passed, winter came again, and I became a year older.
You think you have run far away, but your story never ends.
Even if I have to cling to you, chase after you, and get kicked down...
Is not he in his office?
He was singing real loud a little while ago.
Otherwise, you are doing ten laps around the grounds.
Tomorrow is the presentation for our new project!
But he ran out screaming, We are having curry tonight!
I guess it cannot be helped if it is curry...
When you shine a light on it, it heads toward the light.
It is the smallest robot in the world.
That is why it is called Kabu-tan.
Okay, why do not we have some curry then?
I tried to make something huge...
And that the work is simple, boring and endless.
But I am all right now.
Everyone is amazed when I tell them I rode a bike to Wakkanai...
I know that, so I am all right now.
It is like the edges will melt away.
It is like they are made out of cream...
I wonder how much it costs...
I wonder how you carve them...
There is so much I want to do.
I am brimming with thoughts of things I want to create.
I chase after every image that flies out...
I name and return them to where they ought to be.
I want to open all these boxes...
A single lifetime limits how many boxes you can open.
But if I had someone to help me in my battles...
The Gates of Hell by Rodin, right?
It is displayed at the National Museum of Western Art.
It appears in Dante's Divine Comedy.
It is the place where people abandon all hope before entering Hell.
Dore that you like uses that theme, too.
Since they chose this motif, they must have been stressed about something as well.
Seems like there is a dull light coming from the inside, does not it?
That is because the light is being refracted inside.
I do not have the right to take that away.
No way, you f-finally got a call from her?
Waha, it is been a while, Mayama-san
He is on the project with Rika-san?
Man, she is really in a bind...
I can figure out the situation just from this picture...
It seems like he is totally in love with Rika.
He is Spain's top runner after all...
I wonder if Rika-san is okay?
Is not she worn down enough already?
So she faxed Mayama an SO IS...
She is going to use him as a guard dog, huh?
Well, as long as I am with her, I will not let anyone lay a finger on her.
I smell a beast in this man!?
He is probably the most dangerous person by Rika's side!
Instead of a guard dog, he is already turned into a rabid dog!
A wolf on the outside and a rabid dog on the inside!
It must have been a tough choice, after putting those two on the scale.
But does not Rika-san look even thinner in this picture?
If I could, I would fly there myself and take her under my wing.
Of course, I am already prepared for that.
Even when she is not hungry, she can eat rice with bonito flakes and soy sauce.
It is like a care package from home...
Do they have seasoning for it?
Somen is flavorless without beefsteak and green onion...
Do not they have ginger over there?
They should have plenty of herbs...
Mint and lemon balm on somen?!
That is not fit for human consumption!
That is on the same level as Yamada's special menus!
Either way, I cannot let Rika-san eat something like that...
Daikon sprouts are spicy, so they are great as spice.
You can eat them after three days if you spread them on top of a damp cloth.
You should take some seeds and plant them as soon as you get there.
I will try that as soon as I get there.
I will try that as soon as I get there.
I am taking Leader for a walk.
You really wanted me to come chasing after you, did not you?
I really did not think that!
P-Please do not stare at me like that!
Will not you please talk to her?
You can see what Hagu is up against, cannot you?
Your paths will separate if you do not talk to her now.
umaku hanashi ga dekinakute I feel really bad...
hontou wa sumanai to omotteru...that I cannot say it right.
shibaraku nayandemo mitakedo I worried over it for a while...
sono uchi tsukarete nemutteru...but I eventually gave up and fell asleep.
shuumatsu no kono machi no kuuki wa The air in this town on the weekend...
hitoikire de musekaeri...is heavy with the crowd.
When I let out a deep sigh...
gaitou speaker ni kesareta...the external speaker overrode it.
Even when I try to say it well...
tsutawaru koto nado hajime kara nai...there never was anything to be communicated.
nigiyaka na kono machi no In this busy town...
sora ni omoikiri hariageta koe wa...
I always thought that there must be something that only I am capable of.
And to that person who was so kind to me...
I will get Dad's company back.
ano hito e no happy birthday...
It follows wherever the light leads it.
nanika chiisana trouble de A slight trouble got us lost...
dareka no tsumaranai joke ni And I started laughing...
honno sukoshi dake waratta...at people's stupid jokes.
itsuka kono machi no dokoka de I still do not know...
kimi to guuzen deattemo...what to say...
nani wo hanashitara ii no ka...if I were to meet you...
i am about to demo yoku wakaranai...randomly somewhere in this town.
hitotsu zutsu kowarete yuku sekai de What is the meaning behind the tears...
nagashita namida ni nan no imi ga aru...that I she would in this gradually crumbling world?
We are not going for a walk?
nigiyaka na kono machi no sora ni In this busy town...
dokoka tooku no machi ni iru
And to that person in a distant town...
ano hito e no happy birthday...
I wonder if Mayama-san is in Spain already...
Y-Yeah, it is limited to an automatic though.
Then, do you want to go for a drive?
W-Well, I have never driven outside the driving school without an instructor.
I also do not have a car.
But we do have a car.
Y-You want to take my car out for an untried driver's first drive?
What kind of a penalty game is this?!
Let us go to the ocean!
A normal car can only seat five people though...
Me, Hagu-chan, Takemoto-kun, Morita-san, Sensei, Mayama...
So one person will not fit...
Oh, but Mayama is in Spain now, is not he?
A five seater is okay, right?
We can wait until he comes back.
He said he would be back in about a month.
It will be less crowded and better once it is a little colder.
There will be a bunch of seashells to pick up.
I want to pick up seashells!
Now that I think about it, we have never gone to the beach together, have we?
That is true, now that you mention it.
We have taken a boat tour and gone to the hot springs, but we have never gone to the beach together...
Let us all pack bentos, bring our cameras, take a lot of pictures, and eat a lot of food...
And pick up a lot of shells...
I bet it will be a lot of fun!
In the end, we never went to the ocean.
Even though we did not have a single picture...
That image of everyone together burned into the back of our eyelids...
It would be so much easier...
sorezore no michi wo yuku sono wakaremichi
At the crossroads where we split ways...
mou nidoto au koto no nai deai wa kanashisugiru
Despite adding the emotions that are lacking...
ittai itsumade onaji kotoba wo kakaekondenda
Just how long am I going to brood over the same word?
